resources.string: FastMediaSorter helps you organize photos, videos, audio, documentation and other files from local folders and network sources.
Connect to local folders, Window/Samba shares (SMB), FTP/SFTP servers, and cloud storage (Google Drive, Dropbox, OneDrive). Browse them all in one place!

Navigate media effortlessly with touch zones in fullscreen player for sorting:

• Tap LEFT side → Previous file
• Tap RIGHT side → Next file
• Tap CENTER → Play/Pause (video/audio)
• Tap TOP/BOTTOM center → Show/Hide controls

During video playback, tap left-middle to rewind or right-middle to fast-forward 10 seconds.

Powerful tools to enhance your workflow:

• OCR (Text Recognition) - Extract text from images
• Translation - Translate text in images and documents
• Text Search - Search within PDF, EPUB, and text files
• Google Lens integration - Identify objects and text

All features work offline after initial setup!

Set up "Destinations" for one-tap move/copy operations using the Floating Action Button.

Configure cloud credentials and network shares in Settings.

To begin, we need storage access permissions.
To browse and manage your files, we need access to your storage.
FastMediaSorter needs storage access to browse and organize your media files. Without this permission, the app cannot function.
Storage permission was denied. Please enable it in app settings to continue.
